General.Name: G3 Global Bhd
General.Description: G3 Global Berhad, an investment holding company, offers information, communication, and technology solutions in Malaysia. It primarily provides artificial intelligence and Internet of Things (IoT) solutions. The company supplies telecommunication services and related products; IoT connected objects hardware devices; and delivers cloud-based data-driven applications and services that are built on low-power wide-area network for connected vehicles, thermal cameras, disease prevention and control, human temperature filters, smart agriculture, smart living homes, D'home smart services, connected cars, connected advanced driver assistance systems, and intelligent cities. It also distributes hospital equipment, pharmaceuticals, and hospital consumables. The company was formerly known as Yen Global Berhad and changed its name to G3 Global Berhad in May 2017. G3 Global Berhad was founded in 1992 and is based in Shah Alam, Malaysia.
